short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to save and monitor the actions defined in your day, using a scoring scheme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to save and monitor the actions defined in your day, using a scoring scheme.

All functions
* Create and remove actions
* set points for each action
* Saves history of actions and date
